name: politico
text:
The convention begins soon, at 8:30 p.m. ET.

We‚Äôre pregaming right now with our pre-show Foursquare, in which our reporters provide analysis and context to break down where we are and what to expect. https://t.co/U9TllgdZSA

name: politico
text:
Analysis: Mike Pence will play a featured role during the RNC tonight.

The VP has mastered the ability to describe Donald Trump in ways that both flatter him and defy realities apparent to anyone who has watched or listened to the president himself
https://t.co/VUwVm2TY97

name: politico
text:
Get quick, digestible facts and insight on the day's news by tuning in to POLITICO Dispatch. Subscribe now.

name: politico
text:
Trump's campaign has highlighting ‚Äúnormal people‚Äù at the RNC, says @nancook, partly to contrast with the DNC which had Hollywood types and former presidents.

And partly because more establishment Republicans did not want to necessarily appear at the RNC
https://t.co/bKQ60okGFu

name: politico
text:
Texas Rep. Dan Crenshaw is the first of two young Republican stars up tonight at the RNC. Elise Stefanik comes later.

This is a generation of young GOPers whose entire career arcs will be shaped by the Trump era right from the start, says @davidsiders
https://t.co/bKQ60okGFu

name: politico
text:
Crenshaw has all the makings of a future presidential candidate, says @MarcACaputo. George P. Bush, another son of Texas (and technically, a son of Florida) is on a potential collision course with him

More RNC live analysis:
https://t.co/bKQ60okGFu

name: politico
text: Cabinet officials, Trump family members, Republican stars and top donors are gathering at the Trump International Hotel in Washington on the sidelines of the Republican National Convention https://t.co/YKSTrUiCAA
